summary: Replaces vanilla texture of Miner Clothes with "immersive as F#$%" texture of Miner Clothes.
descriptionHtml:
Sorry for my English. I'm not native English speaker.

[b][color=#e06666][size=3]This is not my design! No copyright infringement was intended.[/size][/color][/b]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=4]Description:[/size][/color][/font]

This mod replaces vanilla texture of Miner Clothes with "immersive as F#$%" texture of Miner Clothes. Now you can finally fully immerse into world of Skyrim.
If you're a fan of MxR YouTube channel, [b][u]please[/u][/b] endorse and let him know that not only Fallout 4, but now also The Elder Scrolls V contains his immersive clothing. ;)

Resolution of textures is 2K. There is no esp included so you can't deactivate this mod, so if you won't like immersion this mod gives you, you'll have to unintall it. So I highly recommend using mod manager. Wow... this is many "so"s.

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=4]How do I get the clothes?[/size]
[/color][/font]
You can find Miner Clothes in well... mines. But I guess you can just player.additem 6ff43 1

[color=#ffff00]If you have skills to make a new set of clothing with my textures so they won't replace any vanilla ones, then you are free to do it. And if you do, please let me know!

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Credits:[/size][/font][/color]

MxR's Immersive Merchandise - http://shop.crowdmade.com/collections/mxr
MxR's YT Channel - https://www.youtube.com/user/MMOxReview
Original Fallout 4 mod - http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/12090/?
Bethesda Softworks

[color=#93c47d][size=3]Check out my other mods:

author: Larak
